articles.title: How walking an extra 500 steps a day can help you live longer - Insider
articles.description: Walking is a simple, easy exercise and adding even 500 steps a day can help you live longer and prevent heart disease, a cardiologist said.
articles.content:
A long, healthy life starts with taking a simple first step toward better health literally.
